product_name: Isis Riviera Bermuda Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Wear the women's Isis Riviera Bermuda Shorts over your swimsuit while body surfing, stand up paddleboarding, kayaking, you name it. The secure 3-snap waist and quick-dry fabric keep you comfortable. Durable, quick-dry nylon is ideal for water activities. Waistband features 3 snaps to keep shorts on securely while in the water. Pocket has secure rip-and-stick closure with woven pull-tab for quick access; embroidered eyelets allow water to drain out. The women's Isis Riviera Bermuda Shorts feature a mid-rise and 12-in. inseam. Closeout.
short_description: Wear the women's Isis Riviera Bermuda Shorts over your swimsuit while body surfing, stand up paddleboarding, kayaking, you name it. The secure 3-snap waist and quick-dry fabric keep you comfortable.
